summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1237, for the improvement of Spring Street, from 1st Avenue to 2nd Avenue, all in the City of Seattle by paving the same with sandstone blocks, laid upon a proper concrete foundation, together with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 13507 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
